page.title: 02Braddock School by C.Turner
page.content: Our present school was built in 1875, then as the amount of children grew another classroom was added in 1916. In 1947 a kitchen was built on.In 1970 the adjoining cottage was given to the school and used as an infant class. Now there are 27 infants,22 lower juniors and 25 upper juniors. There are 3 teachers,a part_time teacher,an auxiliary,a secretary,2 dinner ladies and a caretaker. The subjects we do are,maths,english, social studies,science,religious education,physical education,art and craft,music,singing and country dancing. We have a playground, copse,field and school garden. We have a successful football and netball team.
